verses.verse: Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to all Israel,<WH3478> "Behold,<WH8085> I have listened to your voice<WH6963> in all that you said<WH559> to me,<WH4427> and have made a king over you.<WH4428>

Now,<WH4428> behold, the king walks<WH1980> before<WH6440> you;<WH2204> and I am old and gray-headed;<WH7867> and behold,<WH1121> my sons are with you:<WH1980> and I have walked before<WH6440> you from my youth<WH5271> to this day.<WH3117>

Here I am.<WH6030> Witness against me before Yahweh,<WH3068> and before his anointed.<WH4899> Whose ox<WH7794> have I taken?<WH3947> Whose donkey<WH2543> have I taken?<WH3947> Whom have I defrauded?<WH6231> Whom have I oppressed?<WH7533> Of whose hand<WH3027> have I taken a ransom<WH3724> to blind<WH5956> my eyes<WH5869> therewith?<WH7725> I will restore it to you."
They said,<WH559> "You have not defrauded<WH6231> us,<WH7533> nor oppressed us,<WH3947> neither have you taken anything<WH3972> of any man<WH376>'s hand.<WH3027>"

He said<WH559> to them,<WH3068> "Yahweh is witness<WH5707> against you,<WH4899> and his anointed is witness<WH5707> this day,<WH3117> that you have not found<WH4672> anything<WH3972> in my hand.<WH3027>" They said,<WH559> "He is witness.<WH5707>"

Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "It is Yahweh<WH3068> who appointed<WH6213> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and that brought<WH5927> your fathers<WH1> up<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

Now therefore stand still,<WH3320> that I may plead<WH8199> with you before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> concerning all the righteous acts<WH6666> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he did<WH6213> to you and to your fathers.<WH1>

"When Jacob<WH3290> had come<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> and your fathers<WH1> cried<WH2199> to Yahweh,<WH3068> then Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> who brought your fathers<WH1> out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> and made them to dwell<WH3427> in this place.<WH4725>

"But they forgot<WH7911> Yahweh<WH3068> their God;<WH430> and he sold<WH4376> them into the hand<WH3027> of Sisera,<WH5516> captain<WH8269> of the army<WH6635> of Hazor,<WH2674> and into the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines,<WH6430> and into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Moab;<WH4124> and they fought against them.<WH3898>

They cried<WH2199> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> <WH2398> 'We have sinned, because we have forsaken<WH5800> Yahweh,<WH3068> and have served<WH5647> the Baals<WH1168> and the Ashtaroth:<WH6252> but now deliver<WH5337> us out of the hand<WH3027> of our enemies,<WH341> and we will serve you.<WH5647>'

Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> Jerubbaal,<WH3378> and Bedan,<WH917> and Jephthah,<WH3316> and Samuel,<WH8050> and delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of your enemies<WH341> on every side;<WH5439> and you lived<WH3427> in safety.<WH983>

"When you saw<WH7200> that Nahash<WH5176> the king<WH4428> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> came<WH935> against you,<WH559> you said to me,<WH4428> 'No, but a king shall reign<WH4427> over us;<WH3068>' when Yahweh your God<WH430> was your king.<WH4428>
Now therefore see the king<WH4428> whom you have chosen,<WH977> and whom you have asked<WH7592> for:<WH3068> and behold, Yahweh has set<WH5414> a king over you.<WH4428>

If you will fear<WH3372> Yahweh,<WH3068> and serve<WH5647> him,<WH8085> and listen to his voice,<WH6963> and not rebel<WH4784> against the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> then both you and also the king<WH4428> who reigns<WH4427> over you are followers<WH310> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But if you will not listen<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh,<WH3068> but rebel<WH4784> against the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> then will the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> be against you,<WH1> as it was against your fathers.
"Now therefore<WH1571> stand<WH3320> still and see<WH7200> this great<WH1419> thing,<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> will do<WH6213> before your eyes.<WH5869>

Isn't<WH2406> it wheat harvest<WH7105> today?<WH3117> I will call<WH7121> to Yahweh,<WH3068> that he may send<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> and rain;<WH4306> and you shall know<WH3045> and see<WH7200> that your wickedness<WH7451> is great,<WH7227> which you have done<WH6213> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> in asking<WH7592> for a king.<WH4428>"

So Samuel<WH8050> called<WH7121> to Yahweh;<WH3068> and Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> and rain<WH4306> that day:<WH3117> and all the people<WH5971> greatly<WH3966> feared<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> and Samuel.<WH8050>

All the people<WH5971> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> "Pray<WH6419> for your servants<WH5650> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> that we not die;<WH4191> for we have added<WH3254> to all our sins<WH2403> this evil,<WH7451> to ask<WH7592> us a king.<WH4428>"

Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Don't<WH3372> be afraid. You have indeed done<WH6213> all this evil;<WH7451> yet don't<WH5493> turn aside from following<WH310> Yahweh,<WH3068> but serve<WH5647> Yahweh<WH3068> with all your heart.<WH3824>
Don't<WH5493> turn aside to go after<WH310> vain<WH8414> things which can't<WH3276> profit nor deliver,<WH5337> for they are vain.<WH8414>

For Yahweh<WH3068> will not forsake<WH5203> his people<WH5971> for his great<WH1419> name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH2974> because it has pleased Yahweh<WH3068> to make<WH6213> you a people to himself.<WH5971>

Moreover as for me,<WH595> far<WH2486> be it from me that I should sin<WH2398> against Yahweh<WH3068> in ceasing<WH2308> to pray<WH6419> for you:<WH3384> but I will instruct you in the good<WH2896> and the right<WH3477> way.<WH1870>
Only fear<WH3372> Yahweh,<WH3068> and serve<WH5647> him in truth<WH571> with all your heart;<WH3824> for consider<WH7200> how great things he has done for you.<WH1431>
But if you shall still<WH7489> do wickedly,<WH7489> you shall be consumed,<WH5595> both you and your king.<WH4428>"
